scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-server
scripts.dev: nodemon --exec NODE_ENV=development ELASTICSEARCH_URL=http://elastic:9200 GRAPHQL_PORT=8007 GNOMAD_MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/exac EXACV1_MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/exac REDIS_HOST=localhost babel-node src/server.js --max_old_space_size=4096
scripts.dev:flush: redis-cli flushall && ELASTICSEARCH_URL=http://elastic:9200 GRAPHQL_PORT=8007 GNOMAD_MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/exac EXACV1_MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/exac REDIS_HOST=localhost babel-node src/server.js --max_old_space_size=4096
scripts.dev:cache: nodemon --exec ELASTICSEARCH_URL=http://elastic:9200 GRAPHQL_PORT=8007 GNOMAD_MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/exac EXACV1_MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost:27017/exac REDIS_HOST=localhost babel-node src/server.js --max_old_space_size=4096
